abstract: A judge took the unusual step Wednesday of reversing a jury verdict, finding that the evidence did not support the conviction of a former New York Stock Exchange supervisor who once oversaw trading in General Electric stock.
lead_paragraph: A judge took the unusual step Wednesday of reversing a jury verdict, finding that the evidence did not support the conviction of a former New York Stock Exchange supervisor who once oversaw trading in General Electric stock.

headline.main: U.S. Judge Voids Guilty Verdict of Big Board Specialist in G.E.
